title: The essays, or councils, civil and moral, of Sir Francis Bacon, Lord Verulam, Viscount St. Alban with a table of the colours of good and evil, and a discourse of The wisdom of the ancients : to this edition is added The character of Queen Elizabeth, never before printed in English.
author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
publisher: Printed for H. Herringman, R. Scot, R. Chiswell, A. Swalle, and R. Bentley ,
notes: Added t.p. and separating ([10], 17-123 p.) following p. 21: The wisdom of the ancients / done into English by Sir Arthur Gorges.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
